org.jsfml.graphics

Interface TextStyle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Text

    public interface TextStyle
    Provides text style constants.

    These constants can be combined using an arithmetic OR operation to define a text style.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int BOLD
      Bold drawing style.
      static int ITALIC
      Italic drawing style.
      static int REGULAR
      Regular drawing style.
      static int UNDERLINED
      Underlined drawing style.
